name: Starchaser (Virtual Nomad)
description:
Collect Stars by launching yourself into Orbit!

  • [Click] to Launch/Escape Orbit
  • Additional Planet added every 5 Levels
  • Difficulty increases every 5 Levels (Orbits get tighter/harder to Enter)
  • [Restart] to Remove Progress (you've been warned)
  • Don't Get Lost and Waste No Clicks to earn a Star!
  • Progress Saved between Sessions
  • [ESC] to Return to Title Menu (WIN Only)

Credits:

  • Code: Virtual Nomad
  • Pilot: BlinkOK
  • Music: Eric Matyas
